description: System-generated unique identifier for this status change record.
Timestamp when the status change was recorded in the system.
Identifier of the affected user whose profile status changed.
Identifier of the userâ€™s profile associated with this change event.
Lookup key to a static profile code/dimension used for reporting; likely a stable reference decoupled from transactional IDs; confirm with SME.
Human-readable description for the static profile code; confirm with SME.
Code representing the profile status after the change.
Lookup key to the static code/dimension for the new status; confirm with SME.
Human-readable description of the new status from the static lookup; confirm with SME.
Code representing the profile status before the change.
Lookup key to the static code/dimension for the prior status; confirm with SME.
Human-readable description of the prior status from the static lookup; confirm with SME.
System timestamp for the most recent update to this row, any source.
Application-level audit timestamp for the most recent modification; likely mirrors the modified date fields; confirm with SME.
User or service account that created this change record.
Timestamp when this change record was created.
User or service account that last updated this change record.
Timestamp when this change record was last updated.
